Package org.freezedry.serialization

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Serializer
    Interface for serialization/deserialization of Java objects for transporting across the network.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonPersistenceSerializer
    Serializes objects into JSON and deserializes JSON back into objects using the FreezeDry framework's JsonPersistence engine.
    KeyValuePersistenceSerializer
    Serializes objects into a list of key-value pairs and deserializes key-value pairs back into objects using the FreezeDry framework's KeyValuePersistence engine.
    ObjectSerializer
    Serializes objects into Java serializes form and deserializes them back into objects.
    PersistenceSerializer
    Serializes objects into a serializes for specified by the Persistence engine, and deserializes that form back into objects using the same Persistence engine.
    SerializerFactory  
    XmlPersistenceSerializer
    Serializes objects into XML and deserializes XML back into objects using the FreezeDry framework's XmlPersistence engine.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SerializerFactory.SerializerType
